info.name: Wikipedia API Exercise
info.description:
API URL: [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php)

This is the English Wikipedia API and it follow the pattern of "[https://www.example.org/w/api.php"](https://www.example.org/w/api.php)

# Usage:

This endpoint is used for authentication, page operations, and search. It also provide meta information about the wiki and the logged-in user.

Query parameter exploration:

action=query : Fetch data from and about MediaWiki.

- list=search : "list" is the submodule of action=query module. This will perform a full text search.
    
    - srsearch=Software Testing : Search for page titles or content matching this value. This parameter is required.
        
    - sroffset=10 : When more results are available, use this to continue.
        
- continue=-|| :
    

format=json : Output data in JSON format

- formatversion=2 : Output formatting = Modern format. This is a parameter of format module
    

# Unhappy Path

## 1\. Test cases for "action"

Pre-condition: none

- 1.1: action value is invalid
    
- 1.2: action valie is empty
    

if action is missinig, then the response return the html of API documentation page. Therefore, no test case was written for this scenario.

## 2\. Test cases for "list"

Pre-condition: action must be "query", format must be "json"

- 2.1: list is invalid, other parameters are either present or not present
    
- 2.2: list is empty / missing, other parameters are either present or not present
    
- 2.3: list is "search", but missing require parameter "srsearch"
    

## 3\. Test cases for "formatversion"

Pre-condition: action must be "query", format must be "json"

- 3.1: formatversion is empty, other query params are present
    
- 3.2: formatversion is invalid (not 1 or 2), other query params are present
    
- 3.3: formatversion is invalid, other query params are present, but "list" is missing / empty / invalid
    
- 3.4: formatversion is invalid, other query params are present, but "srsearch" is missing
    

## 4\. Test cases for "sroffset"

Pre-condition: action must be "query", format must be "json", list must be "search", srsearch must present.

- 4.1: sroffset is string
    
- 4.2: sroffset is larger than 9999
    
- 4.3: sroffset is lower than 0
    

# Happy Path

Pre-condition: format must be "json"

- All query parameters are correct

exec: pm.test("Response is in JSON format (pretty-print in HTML).", () => {
pm.test("Response is in JSON format (pretty-print in HTML).", () => {

item.name: 2.1: list is invalid, other parameters are present
2.2: list is empty / missing, other parameters are either present or not present
2.3: list is "search", but missing require parameter "srsearch"

exec: pm.test("Response return error on required parameter srsearch", () => {

item.name: 3.1: formatversion is empty, other query params are present

exec: //     pm.test("Response return error on Missing required parameter srsearch", () => {

item.name: 3.2: formatversion is invalid (not 1 or 2), other query params are present

exec: //     pm.test("Response return error on Missing required parameter srsearch", () => {

item.name: 3.3: formatversion is invalid, other query params are present, but "list" is missing / empty / invalid

exec: //     pm.test("Response return error on Missing required parameter srsearch", () => {

item.name: 3.4: formatversion is invalid, other query params are present, but "srsearch" is missing

exec: pm.test("Response return error on Missing required parameter srsearch", () => {

pm.expect(response).to.haveOwnProperty('error').to.haveOwnProperty('info').to.include(`Could not retrieve results. Up to 10000 search results are supported, but results starting at ${sroffsetValue} were requested.`);

pm.expect(response).to.haveOwnProperty('warnings').to.haveOwnProperty('search').to.haveOwnProperty('warnings').to.include(`The value \"${sroffsetValue}\" for parameter \"sroffset\" must be no less than 0.`);
pm.test("Searched items have all required fields", () => {
